DOC.brief_summary: The effect 40gr Okara , gastric empty standard meal ( Muffin cake )
DOC.detailed_description: This trail single blind , cross-over design . The study population include 10 subject . The patient randomly assign receive one two Muffin cake , without 40 gram Okara three occasion ( three visit ) . In two visit subject receive Muffin cake 40 gram Okara ( similar caloric value ) , one visit Muffin cake without Okara . Postprandial gastric emptying time measure subject , 13C Breath Test . Okara natural water extract food grade soy product , contain approximately 35 % protein ( mfb ) , 43 % dietary fiber .
DOC.criteria: Healthy volunteer Age 2065 year old Written Informed Consent History gastrointestinal surgery On medication may influence gastric emptying , medication weight loss Patient PPI treatment , H2 Blockers medication weight loss Known allergy soy Pregnancy breastfeed Smoking Athletes Metabolic syndrome diabetes mellitus Family history metabolic syndrome diabetes mellitus Weight loss > 2 kg two month study
